flavorText: Though he eventually came to despise Tocasia, Mishra listened well to her lessons on clarity of purpose. Unlike his brother, he focused his mind on a single goal.
name: Mishra's Workshop
originalText: {T}: Add {3} to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.

rulings.text: This mana may be used on additional costs to cast the spell, such as Kicker.
You can spend the mana on costs on the spell’s text.
The mana can’t be used to pay Echo costs.
This mana may not be used to pay costs imposed after the spell is initially cast.

text: {T}: Add {C}{C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells.
